verses.verse: Zedekiah<WH6667> the son<WH1121> of Josiah<WH2977> reigned<WH4427> as king,<WH4428> instead of Coniah<WH3659> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiakim,<WH3079> whom Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> made king<WH4427> in the land<WH776> of Judah.<WH3063>

But neither he,<WH5650> nor his servants, nor the people<WH5971> of the land,<WH776> listened<WH8085> to the words<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> which he spoke<WH1696> by<WH3027> the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah.<WH3414>

Zedekiah<WH6667> the king<WH4428> sent<WH7971> Jehucal<WH3081> the son<WH1121> of Shelemiah,<WH8018> and Zephaniah<WH6846> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah,<WH4641> the priest,<WH3548> to the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559> Pray<WH6419> now to Yahweh<WH3068> our God for us.<WH430>
Now Jeremiah<WH3414> came in<WH935> and went out<WH3318> among<WH8432> the people;<WH5971> for they had not put<WH5414> him into prison.<WH1004>

Pharaoh<WH6547>'s army<WH2428> had come forth<WH3318> out<WH3318> of Egypt;<WH4714> and when the Chaldeans<WH3778> who were besieging<WH6696> Jerusalem<WH3389> heard<WH8085> news<WH8088> of them,<WH3389> they broke up from Jerusalem.
Then came the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> to the prophet<WH5030> Jeremiah,<WH3414> saying,<WH559>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> You shall tell<WH559> the king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> who sent<WH7971> you to me to inquire<WH1875> of me:<WH6547> Behold, Pharaoh's army,<WH2428> which has come forth<WH3318> to help<WH5833> you,<WH7725> shall return to Egypt<WH4714> into their own land.<WH776>
The Chaldeans<WH3778> shall come again,<WH7725> and fight<WH3898> against this city;<WH5892> and they shall take<WH3920> it,<WH8313> and burn it with fire.<WH784>
Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> Don't<WH5377> deceive yourselves,<WH5315> saying,<WH559> The Chaldeans<WH3778> shall surely<WH1980> depart<WH3212> from us;<WH3212> for they shall not depart.

For though you had struck<WH5221> the whole army<WH2428> of the Chaldeans<WH3778> who fight<WH3898> against you,<WH7604> and there remained but wounded<WH1856> men<WH582> among them,<WH6965> yes would they rise up every man<WH376> in his tent,<WH168> and burn<WH8313> this city<WH5892> with fire.<WH784>
It happened that,<WH2428> when the army of the Chaldeans<WH3778> was broken up<WH5927> from Jerusalem<WH3389> for fear<WH6440> of Pharaoh<WH6547>'s army,<WH2428>

then Jeremiah<WH3414> went forth<WH3318> out<WH3318> of Jerusalem<WH3389> to go<WH3212> into the land<WH776> of Benjamin,<WH1144> to receive his portion there,<WH8432> in the midst of the people.<WH5971>

When he was in the gate<WH8179> of Benjamin,<WH1144> a captain<WH1167> of the guard<WH6488> was there,<WH8034> whose name was Irijah,<WH3376> the son<WH1121> of Shelemiah,<WH8018> the son<WH1121> of Hananiah;<WH2608> and he laid hold<WH8610> on Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet,<WH5030> saying,<WH559> You are falling away<WH5307> to the Chaldeans.<WH3778>

Then Jeremiah<WH3414> said,<WH559> It is false;<WH8267> I am not falling away<WH5307> to the Chaldeans.<WH3778> But he didn't<WH8085> listen to him;<WH3376> so Irijah laid hold<WH8610> on Jeremiah,<WH3414> and brought<WH8610> him to the princes.<WH8269>

The princes<WH8269> were angry<WH7107> with Jeremiah,<WH3414> and struck<WH5221> him,<WH5414> and put him in prison<WH612> in the house<WH1004> of Jonathan<WH3083> the scribe;<WH5608> for they had made<WH6213> that the prison.<WH3608>
When Jeremiah<WH3414> had come into<WH935> the dungeon<WH1004> house,<WH2588> and into the cells, and Jeremiah<WH3414> had remained<WH3427> there many<WH7227> days;<WH3117>

Then Zedekiah<WH6667> the king<WH4428> sent,<WH7971> and fetched<WH3947> him:<WH4428> and the king asked<WH7592> him secretly<WH5643> in his house,<WH1004> and said,<WH559> Is there any word<WH1697> from Yahweh?<WH3068> Jeremiah<WH3414> said,<WH559> There is.<WH3426> He said<WH559> also,<WH5414> You shall be delivered into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon.<WH894>

Moreover Jeremiah<WH3414> said<WH559> to king<WH4428> Zedekiah,<WH6667> Wherein have I sinned<WH2398> against you,<WH5650> or against your servants, or against this people,<WH5971> that you have put<WH5414> me in prison?<WH1004>
Where now<WH346> are your prophets<WH5030> who prophesied<WH5012> to you,<WH559> saying, The king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> shall not come<WH935> against you,<WH776> nor against this land?

Now please hear,<WH8085> my lord<WH113> the king:<WH4428> please let my supplication<WH8467> be presented<WH5307> before<WH6440> you,<WH7725> that you not cause me to return to the house<WH1004> of Jonathan<WH3083> the scribe,<WH5608> lest I die there.<WH4191>

Then Zedekiah<WH6667> the king<WH4428> commanded,<WH6680> and they committed<WH6485> Jeremiah<WH3414> into the court<WH2691> of the guard;<WH4307> and they gave<WH5414> him daily<WH3117> a loaf<WH3603> of bread<WH3899> out of the bakers<WH644>' street,<WH2351> until all the bread<WH3899> in the city<WH5892> was spent.<WH8552> Thus Jeremiah<WH3414> remained<WH3427> in the court<WH2691> of the guard.<WH4307>
